_meanings:
To hurt,
injure, kill.

{@--1@} To do (in general); {#tAta#} 

{#kiMkaravARyahaM#}.

{@--3@} To manufacture, shape, prepare;
{#kuMBakAro GawaM karoti; kawaM karoti#} &c.

{@--4@} To build, create; {#gfhaM kuru; saBAM#}
{#kuru madarTe BoH#}

{@--6@} To form, arrange; {#aMjaliM#} 
{#karoti; kapotahastakaM kftvA#}.

{@--7@} To write,
compose; {#cakAra sumanoharaM SAstraM#} <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>

{@--8@} To perform, be engaged in; {#pUjAM#}
{#karoti#}.

{@--9@} To tell, narrate; {#iti#} 
{#bahuviDAH kaTAH kurvan#} &c.

{@--12@}
To throw or let out, discharge,
emit; {#mUtraM kf#} to discharge urine, make
water; so {#purIzaM kf#} to void excrement.

{@--13@} To assume, put on, take;  
{#strIrUpaM kftvA; nAnArUpARi kurvARaH#} <ls>Y. 3. 162.</ls>

{@--14@} To send forth, utter; {#mAnuzIM#}
{#giraM kftvA, kalaravaM kftvA#} &c.

{@--17@} To cook
(as food) as in {#kftAnnaM#}.

{@--25@} To divide, break
into parts (with adverbs ending in
{#DA#}); {#dviDA kf#} to divide into two
parts; {#SataDA kf, sahasraDA kf#} &c.

{@--26@}
To cause to become subject to, 
reduce completely to (a particular
condition, with adverbs ending in 

{#sAt#}); {#AtmasAt kf#} to subject or
appropriate to oneself; <ls>R. 8. 2</ls>;  
{#BasmasAt kf#} to reduce to ashes.

{@--27@} To
appropriate, secure for oneself.

{@--28@}
To help, give aid.

{@--29@} To make
liable.

{@--30@} To violate or outrage (as
a girl).
{@--31@} To begin.
{@--32@} To order.
{@--33@} To free from.

{@--34@} To proceed
with, put in practice.

{@--35@} To 
worship, sacrifice.
To wish to do &c.; <ls>Śi. 14. 41.</ls>
